title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 128-3.12 - Agricultural activities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 128-3.12 - Agricultural activities

State Regulations

Any intentional, knowing or reckless act or omission that in the course of an agricultural activity significantly increases pollutants in the water supply is prohibited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
128-3.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
